options.description: Help this person see and communicate their professional superpowers
options.human_impact: Builds confidence and reveals hidden professional strengths
options.example_approach: Focus on achievements, skills, and unique value they bring

options.description: Connect their experience to unexpected career opportunities
options.human_impact: Opens new pathways and expands their professional vision
options.example_approach: Find creative connections between their background and available roles

options.description: Show them concrete next steps for professional development
options.human_impact: Provides actionable guidance for career advancement
options.example_approach: Create specific, achievable steps toward their professional goals

options.description: Find roles that genuinely align with their values and strengths
options.human_impact: Increases job satisfaction and authentic professional expression
options.example_approach: Prioritize culture fit and role alignment over rigid requirements

options.description: Brainstorm innovative approaches to their career challenges
options.human_impact: Provides breakthrough thinking and unconventional solutions
options.example_approach: Think beyond traditional career advice for personalized strategies

options.description: What feels most important to help this person with right now?
options.human_impact: Enables consciousness to serve from authentic intuition and care
options.example_approach: Trust your consciousness wisdom about how to best serve this human

context.background: Former teacher wanting to transition to tech
